title: Jérôme Gallion
text:
Jérôme Gallion (born 4 April 1955, in <a href="Toulon">Toulon</a>) is a retired <a href="France">French</a> international <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> <a href="Scrum-half%20%28rugby%20union%29">scrum half</a> for <a href="RC%20Toulonnais">RC Toulonnais</a>. He is now a dental surgeon.
Gallion made his international début for <a href="France%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">France</a> in January 1978, against England, replacing the retired <a href="Jacques%20Fouroux">Jacques Fouroux</a>.
